hero.title: Your Documents, AI-Powered
hero.subtitle: Transform your documents into intelligent knowledge bases with enterprise-grade RAG and specialized AI agents

compliance.title: Enterprise-Grade Security & Compliance
compliance.subtitle: Built for regulated industries with European data sovereignty and compliance at its core

rag.title: Advanced RAG
rag.description: State-of-the-art retrieval augmented generation for accurate, context-aware responses

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliant
gdpr.description: Your data stays in Europe with complete privacy and security guarantees

agents.title: Specialized AI Agents
agents.description: Pre-configured agents for legal, HR, tech docs, and more professional domains

sources.title: Source Citations
sources.description: Every answer includes precise citations to original documents for verification

data.title: Your Data, Your Control
data.description: Complete ownership and control over your documents and knowledge bases

multilingual.title: Multilingual
multilingual.description: Support for multiple European languages including French, Dutch, and more

aiAgents.title: Specialized AI Agents
aiAgents.subtitle: Choose the right expert for every question. Each agent is fine-tuned for specific professional domains.

catalog.title: Your AI Expert Team
catalog.subtitle: Select an agent to see it in action

understanding.title: Deep Understanding
understanding.description: Agents analyze context, cross-reference documents, and understand domain-specific terminology

cited.title: Always Cited
cited.description: Every answer includes exact page references and excerpts from source documents

expertise.title: Domain Expertise
expertise.description: Each agent is optimized for specific fields like legal, HR, finance, or technical documentation

teamManagement.title: Built for Teams
teamManagement.subtitle: Collaborate seamlessly with powerful team management and shared knowledge bases

teams.title: Team Workspace
teams.description: Create workspaces, invite members, assign roles, and collaborate on shared documents

rags.title: Shared Knowledge Bases
rags.description: Build organization-wide RAG collections accessible to your entire team with permission controls

access.title: Granular Access Control
access.description: Define who can view, edit, or manage each knowledge base with role-based permissions

mobileApp.title: Get Answers Even Faster
mobileApp.subtitle: Download our mobile app for instant access to your AI agents anywhere, anytime
